panels.title: EVMOS Node basic & server system metrics for $server

options.content:
# EVMOS Validators monitoring dashboard
Based on influxDB + Telegarf
Project on Github:  [https://github.com/shurinov/mon_evmos/](https://github.com/shurinov/mon_evmos/)

panels.description: Status of monitoring tool. "OK" mean you can trust other dashboard fileds
panels.title: Mon health

panels.description: Time interval between latest block time and server's local time. A large (>15s) value of this parameter may indicate a loss of synchronization.
panels.title: Time since latest block

panels.description: Number of connected peers to node
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: Number of missed blocks in running 100-block window
panels.title: Missed blocks

panels.description: Number of delegated tokens to your validator.

targets.query: SELECT last("delegated")FROM "cosmonitor" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Delegated tokens

panels.description: Total number of validators in network
panels.title: Active validators number

targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("usage_iowait"), 1s) FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("val_rank") as rank FROM "evmos" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("val_active_numb") as total_validators_number FROM "evmos" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), *

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$server/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
